Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Echo Three to Echo Seven.  Han, old buddy, do you read me?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Loud and clear, kid.  What's up?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Well, I finished my circle.  I don't pick up any life readings.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There isn't enough life on this ice cube to fill a space cruiser. The sensors are placed, I'm going back.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Right.  I'll see you shortly. There's a meteorite that hit the ground near here.  I want to check it out.  It won't take long.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hey, steady girl.  What's the matter?  You smell something?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Aaargh!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right, don't lose your temper. I'll come right back and give you a hand.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Solo?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No sign of life out there, General. The sensors are in place.  You'll know if anything comes around.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Commander Skywalker reported in yet?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No.  He's checking out a meteorite that hit near him.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: With all the meteor activity in this system, it's going to be difficult to spot approaching ships.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: General, I've got to leave.  I can't stay anymore.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: I'm sorry to hear that.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, there's a price on my head. If I don't pay off Jabba the Hut, I'm a dead man.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: A death mark's not an easy thing to live with.  You're a good fighter, Solo.  I hate to lose you.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Thank you, General.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, Your Highness, I guess this is it.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: That's right.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, don't get all mushy on me. So long, Princess.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yes, Your Highnessness?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I thought you decided to stay.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, the bounty hunter we ran into on Ord Mantell changed my mind.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han, we need you!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oh, what about you need?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I need?  I don't know what you're talking about.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You probably don't.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: And what precisely am I supposed to know?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on!  You want me to stay because of the way you feel about me.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Yes.  You're a great help to us. You're a natural leader...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No!  That's not it.  Come on. Aahhh - uh huh!  Come on.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You're imagining things.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Am I?  Then why are you following me?  Afraid I was going to leave without giving you a goodbye kiss?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'd just as soon kiss a Wookiee.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I can arrange that.  You could use a good kiss!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Don't try to blame me.  I didn't ask you to turn on the thermal heater.  I merely commented that it was freezing in the princess' chamber.  But it's supposed to be freezing.  How are we going to dry out all her clothes?  I really don't know.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, switch off.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Why do you take this apart now? I'm trying to get us out of here and you pull both of these.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Excuse me, sir.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Put them back together right now.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Might I have a word with you, please?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What do you want?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, it's Princess Leia, sir. She's been trying to get you on the communicator.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I turned it off.  I don't want to talk to her.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh.  Well, Princess Leia is wondering about Master Luke.  He hasn't come back yet.  She doesn't know where he is.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I don't know where he is.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Nobody knows where he is.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What do you mean, "nobody knows"?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, uh, you see...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Deck Officer.  Deck Officer!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Excuse me, sir.  Might I inqu...

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Yes, sir?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Do you know where Commander Skywalker is?

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: I haven't seen him.  It's possible he came in through the south entrance.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's possible?  Why don't you go find out?  It's getting dark out there.

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Excuse me, sir.  Might I inquire what's going on?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Why not?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Impossible man.  Come along, Artoo, let's find Princess Leia.  Between ourselves, I think Master Luke is in considerable danger.

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Sir, Commander Skywalker hasn't come in through the south entrance. He might have forgotten to check in.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Not likely.  Are the speeders ready?

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Not yet.  We're having some trouble adapting them to the cold.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Then we'll have to go out on Tauntauns.

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Sir, the temperature's dropping too rapidly.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's right.  And my friends out in it.

Speaker: assistant officer
Dialogue: I'll cover sector twelve.  Have com-control set screen alpha.

Speaker: deck officer
Dialogue: Your Tauntaun'll freeze before you reach the first marker.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Then I'll see you in hell!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: You must come along now, Artoo. There's really nothing more we can do.  And my joints are freezing up.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Don't say thing like that!  Of course we'll see Master Luke again. He'll be quite all right, you'll see.  Stupid little short-circuit.  He'll be quite all right.

Speaker: lieutenant
Dialogue: Sir, all the patrols are in. There's still no contact from Skywalker or Solo.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Mistress Leia, Artoo says he's been quite unable to pick up any signals, although he does admit that his own range is far too weak to abandon all hope.

Speaker: derlin
Dialogue: Your Highness, there's nothing more we can do tonight.  The shield doors must be closed.

Speaker: derlin
Dialogue: Close the doors.

Speaker: lieutenant
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo says the chances of survival are seven hundred seventy-five... to one.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Actually, Artoo has been known to make mistakes... from time to time. Oh, dear, oh, dear.  Don't worry about Master Luke.  I'm sure he'll be all right.  He's quite clever, you know... for a human being.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Luke... Luke.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben?

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: You will go to the Dagobah system.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Dagobah system?

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: There you will learn from Yoda, the Jedi Master who instructed me.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben... Ben.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke!  Luke!  Don't do this, Luke. Come on, give me a sign here.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben... Ben...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hang on, kid.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Dagobah system...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Whew...

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Dagobah...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: This may smell bad, kid...

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yoda...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: ...but it will keep you warm... til I get the shelter built.  Ooh... I thought they smelled bad on the outside!

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: Echo Base... I've got something!  Not much, but it could be a life form.

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: This is Rogue Two.  this is Rogue Two.  Captain Solo, so you copy? Commander Skywalker, do you copy? This is Rogue Two.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good morning.  Nice of you guys to drop by.

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: Echo Base... this is Rogue Two.  I found them.  Repeat, I found them.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Master Luke, sir, it's so good to see you fully functional again.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo expresses his relief, also.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: How are you feeling, kid?  You don't look so bad to me.  In fact, you look strong enough to pull the ears off a Gundark.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Thanks to you.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's two you owe me, junior.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well your Worship, looks like you managed to keep me around for a little while longer.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I had nothing to do with it.  General Rieekan thinks it's dangerous for any ships to leave the system until we've activated the energy shield.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's a good story.  I think you just can't bear to let a gorgeous guy like me out of your sight.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I don't know where you get your delusions, laser brain.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Laugh it up, fuzzball.  But you didn't see us alone in the south passage.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: She expressed her true feelings for me.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: My...!  Why, you stuck up,... half- witted... scruffy-looking ...nerf- herder!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Who's scruffy-looking?  I must have hit pretty close to the mark to get her all riled up like that, huh, kid?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Why, I guess you don't know everything about women yet?

Speaker: announcer
Dialogue: Headquarters personnel, report to command center.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Take it easy.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Excuse us, please.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Princess... we have a visitor.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: We've picked up something outside the base in zone twelve, moving east.

Speaker: senior controller
Dialogue: It's metal.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Then it couldn't be one of those creatures that attacked Luke.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It could be a speeder, one of ours.

Speaker: senior controller
Dialogue: No.  Wait - there's something very weak coming through.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, I am fluent in six million forms of communication.  This signal is not used by the Alliance.  It could be an Imperial code.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It isn't friendly, whatever it is. Come on, Chewie, let's check it out.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Send Rogues Ten and Eleven to station three-eight.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Afraid there's not much left.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What was it?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Droid of some kind.  I didn't hit it that hard.  It must have had a self-destruct.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: An Imperial probe droid.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: We'd better start the evacuation.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Admiral.

Speaker: ozzel
Dialogue: Yes, Captain

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: I think we've got something, sir. The report is only a fragment from a probe droid in the Hoth system, but it's the best lead we've had.

Speaker: ozzel
Dialogue: We have thousands of probe droids searching the galaxy.  I want proof, not leads!

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: The visuals indicate life readings.

Speaker: ozzel
Dialogue: It could mean anything.  If we followed every lead...

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: But, sir, the Hoth system is supposed to be devoid of human forms.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You found something?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: That's it.  The Rebels are there.

Speaker: ozzel
Dialogue: My lord, there are so many uncharted settlements.  It could be smugglers, it could be...

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: That is the system.  And I'm sure Skywalker is with them.  Set your course for the Hoth system.  General Veers, prepare you men.

Speaker: rebel captain
Dialogue: Groups seven and ten will stay behind to fly the speeders.  As soon as each transport is loaded, evacuation control will give clearance for immediate launch.

Speaker: rebel fighter
Dialogue: Right, sir.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Okay, that's it.  Try it... Off! Turn it off!  Turn it off!  Off!

Speaker: medical droid
Dialogue: Sir, it will take quite a while to evacuate the T-forty- sevens.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Well, forget the heavy equipment. There's plenty of time to get the smaller modules on the transports.

Speaker: medical droid
Dialogue: Take care, sir.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Thanks.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Chewie, take care of yourself, okay?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hi, kid.  You all right?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Be careful.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You, too.

Speaker: controller
Dialogue: General, there's a fleet of Star Destroyers coming out of hyperspace in sector four.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Reroute all power to the energy shield.  We've got to hold them till all transports are away.  Prepare for ground assault.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: What is it, General?

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: My lord, the fleet has moves out of light-speed.  Com-Scan has detected an energy field protecting an area around the sixth planet of the Hoth system.  The field is strong enough to deflect any bombardment.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Rebels are alerted to our presence.  Admiral Ozzel came out of light-speed too close to the system.

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: He felt surprise was wiser...

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: He is as clumsy as he is stupid. General, prepare your troops for a surface attack.

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: ozzel
Dialogue: Lord Vader, the fleet has moved out of light-speed, and we're preparing to... Aaagh!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You have failed me for the last time, Admiral.  Captain Piett.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Make ready to land out troops beyond the energy shield and deploy the fleet so that nothing gets off that system.  You are in command now, Admiral Piett.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Thank you, Lord Vader.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: All troop carriers will assemble at the north entrance.  The heavy transport ships will leave as soon as they're loaded.  Only two fighter escorts per ship.  The energy shield can only be opened for a short time, so you'll have to stay very close to your transports.

Speaker: hobbie
Dialogue: Two fighters against a Star Destroyer?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The ion cannon will fire several shots to make sure that any enemy ships will be out of your flight path.  When you've gotten past the energy shield, proceed directly to the rendezvous point.  Understood?

Speaker: pilots
Dialogue: Right.  Okay.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Good luck.

Speaker: derlin
Dialogue: Okay.  Everyone to your stations. Let's go!

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Their primary target will be the power generators.  Prepare to open the shield.

Speaker: controller
Dialogue: Sir, Rebel ships are coming into our sector.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Good.  Our first catch of the day.

Speaker: woman controller
Dialogue: Stand by, ion control... Fire!

Speaker: announcer
Dialogue: The first transport is away.

Speaker: dack
Dialogue: Feeling all right, sir?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Just like new, Dack.  How about you?

Speaker: dack
Dialogue: Right now I feel like I could take on the whole Empire myself.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I know what you mean.

Speaker: trench officer
Dialogue: Echo Station Three-T-Eight.

Speaker: trench officer
Dialogue: We have spotted Imperial walkers!

Speaker: controller
Dialogue: Imperial walkers on the north ridge.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Echo station Five-Seven.  We're on our way.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: All right, boys, keep tight now.

Speaker: dack
Dialogue: Luke, I have no approach vector. I'm not set.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Steady, Dack.  Attack pattern delta.  Go now!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: All right, I'm coming in.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hobbie, you still with me?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: That armor's too strong for blasters.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: All right, stand by, Dack.

Speaker: dack
Dialogue: Luke, we've got a malfunction in fire control.  I'll have to cut in the auxiliary.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Just hang on.  Hang on, Dack.  Get ready to fire that tow cable.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Dack?  Dack!

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: Yes, Lord Vader.  I've reached the main power generator.  The shield will be down in moments.  You may start your landing.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Rogue Three.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Copy, Rogue Leader

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Coming around, Rogue Leader.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Steady, Rogue Two

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Activate harpoon.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: One more pass.

Speaker: janson
Dialogue: Once more.

Speaker: janson
Dialogue: Cable out!  Let her go!

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Detach cable.

Speaker: janson
Dialogue: Cable detached.

Speaker: trench officer
Dialogue: Come on!

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Whooha!  That got him!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I see it, Wedge.  Good work.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: I don't think we can protect two transports at a time.

Speaker: rieekan
Dialogue: Launch patrols.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Evacuate remaining ground staff.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No, no!  No!  This one goes there, that one goes there.  Right?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, you take good care of Master Luke now, understand?  And ... do take good care of yourself. Oh, dear, oh, dear.

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: All troops will debark for ground assault.  Prepare to target the main generator.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Rogue Two, are you all right?

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: Yeah.  I'm with you, Rogue Leader.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: We'll set harpoon.  I'll cover for you.

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: Coming around.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Watch that cross fire, boys.

Speaker: zev
Dialogue: Steady.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Stay tight and low.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hobbie, I've been hit!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You all right?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Why are you still here?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I heard the command center had been hit.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You got your clearance to leave.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Don't worry.  I'll leave.  First I'm going to get you to your ship.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Your Highness, we must take this last transport.  It's our only hope.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Send all troops in sector twelve to the south slope to protect the fighters.

Speaker: announcer
Dialogue: Imperial troops have entered the base.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on... that's it.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Give the evacuation code signal. And get to your transports!

Speaker: head controller
Dialogue: K-one-zero... all troops disengage.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh!  Wait for me!

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Begin retreat!

Speaker: second officer
Dialogue: Fall back!

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: Distance to power generators?

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: One-seven, decimal two-eight.

Speaker: veers
Dialogue: Target.  Maximum fire power.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: But... but... but... where are you going?  Uh... come back!!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Wait!  Wait for me!  Wait!  Stop!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: How typical.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hurry up, goldenrod, or you're going to be a permanent resident!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Wait!  Wait!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: How's this?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Would it helped if I got out and pushed?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It might.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Captain Solo, Captain Solo... sir, might I suggest that you...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: It can wait.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: This bucket of bolts is never going to get us past that blockade.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: This baby's got a few surprises left in her, sweetheart.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on!  Come on!  Switch over. Let's hope we don't have a burnout.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: See?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Someday you're going to be wrong, and I hope I'm there to see it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Punch it!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo!  Get her ready for takeoff.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Good luck, Luke.  See you at the rendezvous.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Don't worry, Artoo.  We're going, we're going.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's nothing wrong, Artoo. I'm just setting a new course.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: We're not going to regroup with the others.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: We're going to the Dagobah system.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yes, Artoo?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: That's all right.  I'd like to keep it on manual control for a while.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I saw them!  I saw them!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Saw what?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Star Destroyers, two of them, coming right at us.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, sir!  Might I suggest...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Check the deflector shield!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oh, great.  Well, we can still outmaneuver them.

Speaker: imperial officer
Dialogue: Take evasive action!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Prepare to make the jump to light- speed.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: But, sir!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: They're getting closer!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oh yeah?  Watch this.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Watch what?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I think we're in trouble.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: If I may say so, sir, I noticed earlier that the hyperdrive motivator has been damaged.  It's impossible to go to light-speed!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We're in trouble!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Horizontal boosters...!  Bring me the hydrospanners!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I don't know how we're going to get out of this one.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oww!  Chewie!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That was no laser blast!  Something hit us.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han, get up here!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on, Chewie!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Asteroids!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oh, no!  Chewie, set two-seven- one.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What are you doing?  You're not actually going into an asteroid field?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: They'd be crazy to follow us, wouldn't they?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You don't have to do this to impress me.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately three thousand, seven hundred and twenty to one.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Never tell me the odds!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake; well, this could be it, sweetheart.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I take it back.  We're going to get pulverized if we stay out here much longer.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm not going to argue with that.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Pulverized?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm going in closer to one of those big ones.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Closer?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Closer?!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, this is suicide!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There.  That looks pretty good.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What looks pretty good?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah.  That'll do nicely.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Excuse me, ma'am, but where are we going?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I hope you know what you're doing.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, me too.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yes, that's it.  Dagobah.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'm not picking up any cities or technology.  Massive life-form readings, though.  There's something alive down there...

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yes, I'm sure it's perfectly safe for droids.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I know, I know!  All the scopes are dead.  I can't see a thing!  Just hang on, I'm going to start the landing cycle...

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No, Artoo, you stay put.  I'll have a look around.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo!  Where are you?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo!  You be more careful.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo - that way!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Oh, no!  Are you all right?  Come on.  You're lucky you don't taste very good.  Anything broken?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: If you're saying coming here was a bad idea, I'm beginning to agree with you.  Oh, Artoo, what are we doing here?  It's like... something out of a dream, or, I don't know. Maybe I'm just going crazy.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Yes, Admiral?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Our ships have sighted the Millennium Falcon, lord.  But... it has entered an asteroid field and we cannot risk...

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Asteroids do not concern me, Admiral.  I want that ship and not excuses.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, lord.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm going to shut down everything but the emergency power systems.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, I'm almost afraid to ask, but... does that include shutting me down, too?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No, I need you to talk to the Falcon, find out what's wrong with the hyperdrive.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, it's quite possible this asteroid is not entirely stable.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Not entirely stable?  I'm glad you're here to tell us these things.  Chewie, take the professor in the back and plug him into the hyperdrive.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh!  Sometimes I just don't understand human behavior.  After all, I'm only trying to do my job in the most...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Let go.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Sshh!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Let go, please.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Don't get excited.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Captain, being held by you isn't quite enough to get me excited.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Sorry, sweetheart.  We haven't got time for anything else.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ready for some power?  Okay. Let's see now.  Put that in there.  There you go.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Now all I have to do is find this Yoda... if he even exists.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Still... there's something familiar about this place.  I feel like... I don't know...

Speaker: strange voice
Dialogue: Feel like what?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Like we're being watched!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Away with your weapon!  I mean you no harm.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: I am wondering, why are you here?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'm looking for someone.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Looking?  Found someone, you have, I would say, hmmm?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Right.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Help you I can.  Yes, mmmm.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I don't think so.  I'm looking for a great warrior.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Ahhh!  A great warrior.  Wars not make one great.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Put that down.  Hey!  That's my dinner!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: How you get so big, eating food of this kind?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Listen, friend, we didn't mean to land in that puddle, and if we could get our ship out, we would, but we can't, so why don't you just...

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Aww, cannot get your ship out?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hey, you could have broken this. Don't do that.  Ohhh... you're making a mess.  Hey, give me that!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mine!  Or I will help you not.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I don't want your help.  I want my lamp back.  I'll need it to get out of this slimy mudhole.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mudhole?  Slimy?  My home this is.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Ah, ah, ah!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Oh, Artoo, let him have it!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mine!  Mine!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Artoo!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mine!

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mine!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Now will you move along, little fella?  We're got a lot of work to do.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: No!  No, no!  Stay and help you, I will.  Find your friend, hmm?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'm not looking for a friend. I'm looking for a Jedi Master.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Oohhh.  Jedi Master.  Yoda.  You seek Yoda.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You know him?

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Mmm.  Take you to him, I will.  Yes, yes.  But now, we must eat. Come.  Good food.  Come.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Come, come.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Stay here and watch after the camp, Artoo.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, where is Artoo when I need him?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, I don't know where your ship learned to communicate, but it has the most peculiar dialect.  I believe, sir, it says that the power coupling on the negative axis has been polarized.  I'm afraid you'll have to replace it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, of course I'll have to replace it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Here!  And Chewie...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: ... I think we'd better replace the negative power coupling.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, Your Worship, I'm only trying to help.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Would you please stop calling me that?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Sure, Leia.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh, you make it so difficult sometimes.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I do, I really do.  You could be a little nicer, though.  Come on, admit it.  Sometimes you think I'm all right.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Occasionally...  ... when you aren't acting like a scoundrel.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Scoundrel?  Scoundrel?  I like the sound of that.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Stop that.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Stop what?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Stop that!  My hands are dirty.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: My hands are dirty, too.  What are you afraid of?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Afraid?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You're trembling.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'm not trembling.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough scoundrels in your life.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I happen to like nice men.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm a nice man.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No, you're not.  You're...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, sir!  I've isolated the reverse power flux coupling.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Thank you.  Thank you very much.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, you're perfectly welcome, sir.

Speaker: needa
Dialogue: ... and that, Lord Vader, was the last time they appeared in any of our scopes.  Considering the amount of damage we've sustained, they must have been destroyed.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: No, Captain, they're alive.  I want every ship available to sweep the asteroid field until they are found.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Lord Vader.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Yes, Admiral, what is it?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: The Emperor commands you make contact with him.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Move the ship out of the asteroid field so that we can send a clear transmission.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: What is thy bidding, my master?

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: There is a great disturbance in the Force.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: I have felt it.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: We have a new enemy - Luke Skywalker.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Yes, my master.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: He could destroy us.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: He's just a boy.  Obi-Wan can no longer help him.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: The Force is strong with him.  The son of Skywalker must not become a Jedi.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: If he could be turned, he would become a powerful ally.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Yes.  Yes.  He would be a great asset.  Can it be done?

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: He will join us or die, my master.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Look, I'm sure it's delicious. I just don't understand why we can't see Yoda now.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Patience!  For the Jedi it is time to eat as well.  Eat, eat. Hot.  Good food, hm? Good, hmm?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: How far away is Yoda?  Will it take us long to get there?

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Not far.  Yoda not far.  Patience. Soon you will be with him.  Rootleaf, I cook.  Why wish you become Jedi?  Hm?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Mostly because of my father, I guess.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: Ah, your father.  Powerful Jedi was he, powerful Jedi, mmm.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Oh, I don't know what I'm doing here.  We're wasting our time.

Speaker: creature
Dialogue: I cannot teach him.  The boy has no patience.

Speaker: ben's voice
Dialogue: He will learn patience.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Hmmm.  Much anger in him, like his father.

Speaker: ben's voice
Dialogue: Was I any different when you taught me?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Hah.  He is not ready.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yoda!  I am ready.  I... Ben!  I can be a Jedi.  Ben, tell him I'm ready.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Ready, are you?  What know you of ready?  For eight hundred years have I trained Jedi.  My own counsel will I keep on who is to be trained! A Jedi must have the deepest commitment, the most serious mind.  You are reckless!

Speaker: ben's voice
Dialogue: So was I, if you'll remember.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: He is too old.  Yes, too old to begin the training.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I've learned so much.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Will he finished what he begins?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I won't fail you - I'm not afraid.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Oh, you will be.  You will be.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, if I may venture an opinion...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm not really interested in your opinion, Threepio.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: There's something out there.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Where?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Outside, in the cave.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: There it is.  Listen!  Listen!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm going out there.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Are you crazy?!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I just got this bucket back together.  I'm not going to let something tear it apart.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Then I'm going with you.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I think it might be better if I stay here and guard the ship.  Oh, no.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: This ground sure feels strange. It doesn't feel like rock at all.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There's an awful lot of moisture in here.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I don't know.  I have a bad feeling about this.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Watch out!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, that's what I thought. Mynock.  Chewie, check the rest of the ship, make sure there aren't any more attached.  They're chewing on the power cables.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Mynocks?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Go on inside.  We'll clean them off if there are any more.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Ohhh!  Go away!  Go away!  Beastly little thing.  Shoo!  Shoo!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Wait a minute...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right, Chewie, let's get out of here!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The Empire is still out there. I don't think it's wise to...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No time to discuss this in committee.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I am not a committee!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You can't make the jump to light- speed in this asteroid field...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Sit down, sweetheart.  We're taking off!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Look!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I see it, I see it.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: We're doomed!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The cave is collapsing.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: This is no cave.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Run!  Yes.  A Jedi's strength flows from the Force.  But beware of the dark side.  Anger... fear... aggression.  The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight.  If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny, consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan's apprentice.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Vader.  Is the dark side stronger?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No... no... no.  Quicker, easier, more seductive.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But how am I to know the good side from the bad?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: You will know.  When you are calm, at peace.  Passive.  A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But tell me why I can't...

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No, no, there is no why.  Nothing more will I teach you today. Clear your mind of questions. Mmm.  Mmmmmmmm.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's something not right here.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I feel cold, death.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: That place... is strong with the dark side of the Force.  A domain of evil it is.  In you must go.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: What's in there?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Only what you take with you.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Your weapons... you will not need them.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Bounty hunters.  We don't need that scum.

Speaker: first controller
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Those Rebels won't escape us.

Speaker: second controller
Dialogue: Sir, we have a priority signal from the Star Destroyer Avenger.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Right.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: ... there will be a substantial reward for the one who finds the Millennium Falcon.  You are free to use any methods necessary, but I want them alive.  No disintegrations.

Speaker: boba fett
Dialogue: As you wish.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Lord Vader!  My lord, we have them.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, thank goodness we're coming out of the asteroid field.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Let's get out of here.  Ready for light-speed?  One... two... three!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's not fair!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The transfer circuits are working. It's not my fault!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No light-speed?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's not my fault.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, we just lost the main rear deflector shield.  One more direct hit on the back quarter and we're done for.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Turn her around.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I said turn her around!  I'm going to put all power in the front shield.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You're going to attack them?!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sir, the odds of surviving a direct assault on an Imperial Star Destroyer...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Shut up!

Speaker: needa
Dialogue: They're moving to attack position!  Shields up!

Speaker: needa
Dialogue: Track them.  They may come around for another pass.

Speaker: tracking officer
Dialogue: Captain Needa, the ship no longer appears on our scopes.

Speaker: needa
Dialogue: They can't have disappeared.  No ship that small has a cloaking device.

Speaker: tracking officer
Dialogue: Well, there's no trace of them, sir.

Speaker: communications officer
Dialogue: Captain, Lord Vader demands an update on the pursuit.

Speaker: needa
Dialogue: Get a shuttle ready.  I shall assume full responsibility for losing them, and apologize to Lord Vader. Meanwhile, continue to scan the area.

Speaker: communications officer
Dialogue: Yes, Captain Needa.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Use the Force.  Yes...

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Now... the stone.  Feel it.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Concentrate!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Oh, no.  We'll never get it out now.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: So certain are you.  Always with you it cannot be done.  Hear you nothing that I say?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Master, moving stones around is one thing.  This is totally different.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No!  No different!  Only different in your mind.  You must unlearn what you have learned.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: All right, I'll give it a try.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No!  Try not.  Do.  Or do not. There is no try.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I can't.  It's too big.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Size matters not.  Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hm?  Mmmm.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: And well you should not.  For my ally in the Force.  And a powerful ally it is.  Life creates it, makes it grow.  Its energy surrounds us and binds us.  Luminous beings are we...  Here, between you... me... the tree... the rock... everywhere! Yes, even between this land and that ship!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You want the impossible.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I don't... I don't believe it.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: That is why you fail.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Apology accepted, Captain Needa.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Lord Vader, our ships have completed their scan of the area and found nothing.  If the Millennium Falcon went into light- speed, it'll be on the other side of the galaxy by now.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Alert all commands.  Calculate every possible destination along their last know trajectory.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.  We'll find them.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Don't fail me again, Admiral.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Alert all commands.  Deploy the fleet.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Captain Solo, this time you have gone too far.  No, I will not be quiet, Chewbacca. Why doesn't anyone listen to me?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The fleet is beginning to break up.  Go back and stand by the manual release for the landing claw.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I really don't see how that is going to help.  Surrender is a perfectly acceptable alternative in extreme circumstances.  The Empire may be gracious enough...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Thank you.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What did you have in mind for your next move?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, if they follow standard Imperial procedure, they'll dump their garbage before they go to light-speed, then we just float away.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: With the rest of the garbage. Then what?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Then we've got to find a safe port somewhere around here.  Got any ideas?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No.  Where are we?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The Anoat system.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Anoat system.  There's not much there.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No.  Well, wait.  This is interesting.  Lando.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Lando system?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Lando's not a system, he's a man. Lando Calrissian.  He's a card player, gambler, scoundrel.  You'd like him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Thanks.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Bespin.  It's pretty far, but I think we can make it.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: A mining colony?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, a Tibanna gas mine.  Lando conned somebody out of it.  We go back a long way, Lando and me.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Can you trust him?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No.  But he has no love for the Empire, I can tell you that.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Here we go, Chewie.  Stand by. Detach!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You do have your moments.  Not many, but you have them.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Concentrate... feel the Force flow.  Yes.  Good.  Calm, yes. Through the Force, things you will see.  Other places.  The future... the past.  Old friends long gone.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Han!  Leia!

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Hmm.  Control, control.  You must learn control.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I saw... I saw a city in the clouds.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Mmm.  Friends you have there.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: They were in pain.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: It is the future you see.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Future?  Will they die?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Difficult to see.  Always in motion is the future.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I've got to go to them.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Decide you must how to serve them best.  If you leave now, help them you could.  But you would destroy all for which they have fought and suffered.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No, I don't have a landing permit.  I'm trying to reach Lando Calrissian.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Whoa!  Wait a minute!  Let me explain.

Speaker: intercom voice
Dialogue: You will not deviate from your present course.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Rather touchy, aren't they?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I thought you knew this person.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, that was a long time ago. I'm sure he's forgotten about that.

Speaker: intercom voice
Dialogue: Permission granted to land on Platform Three-two-seven.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Thank you.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There's nothing to worry about. We go way back, Lando and me.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Who's worried?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh.  No one to meet us.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I don't like this.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, what would you like?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, they did let us land.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Look, don't worry.  Everything's going to be fine.  Trust me.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: See?  My friend.  Keep your eyes open, okay?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Why, you slimy, double-crossing, no-good swindler!  You've got a lot of guts coming here, after what you pulled.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: How you doing, you old pirate? So good to see you!  I never thought I'd catch up with you again.  Where you been?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, he seems very friendly.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Yes... very friendly.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: What are you doing here?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Ahh... repairs.  I thought you could help me out.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: What have you done to my ship?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Your ship?  Hey, remember, you lost her to me fair and square.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Hello.  What have we here? Welcome.  I'm Lando Calrissian. I'm the administrator of this facility.  And who might you be?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Leia.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Welcome, Leia.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right, all right, you old smoothie.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Hello, sir.  I am See-Threepio, human-cyborg relations.  My facilities are at your...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, really!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: What's wrong with the Falcon?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hyperdrive.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: I'll get my people to work on it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You know, that ship saved my life quite a few times.  She's the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: How's the gas mine?  Is it paying off for you?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Oh, not as well as I'd like. We're a small outpost and not very self-sufficient.  And I've had supply problems of every kind. I've had labor difficulties...  What's so funny?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You.  Listen to you - you sound like a businessman, a responsible leader.  Who'd have thought that, huh?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You know, seeing you sure brings back a few things.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Yeah.  I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being successful.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh!  Nice to see a familiar face.

Speaker: second threepio
Dialogue: E chu ta!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: How rude!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: That sounds like an R2 unit in there.  I wonder if...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Hello?  How interesting.  Oh, my.

Speaker: man's voice
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, I'm terribly sorry.  I... I didn't mean to intrude.  No, no, please don't get up.  No!

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Luke!  You must complete the training.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I can't keep the vision out of my head.  They're my friends.  I've got to help them.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: You must not go!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But Han and Leia will die if I don't.

Speaker: ben's voice
Dialogue: You don't know that.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Even Yoda cannot see their fate.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I can help them!  I feel the Force!

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: But you cannot control it.  This is a dangerous time for you, when you will be tempted by the dark side of the Force.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Yes, yes.  To Obi-Wan you listen. The cave.  Remember your failure at the cave!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I've learned so much since then.  Master Yoda, I promise to return and finish what I've begun. You have my word.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: It is you and your abilities the Emperor wants.  that is why your friends are made to suffer.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: And that is why I have to go.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Luke, I don't want to lose you to the Emperor the way I lost Vader.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You won't.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Stopped they must be.  On this all depends.  Only a fully trained Jedi Knight with the Force as his ally will conquer Vader and his Emperor.  If you end your training now, if you choose the quick and easy path, as Vader did, you will become an agent of evil.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Patience.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: And sacrifice Han and Leia?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: If you honor what they fight for ... yes!

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: If you choose to face Vader, you will do it alone.  I cannot interfere.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I understand.  Artoo, fire up the converters.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Luke, don't give in to hate - that leads to the dark side.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Strong is Vader.  Mind what you have learned.  Save you it can.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I will.  And I'll return.  I promise.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Told you, I did.  Reckless is he.  Now matters are worse.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: That boy is our last hope.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No.  There is another.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The ship is almost finished. Two or Three more things and we're in great shape.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The sooner the better.  Something's wrong here.  No one has seen or knows anything about Threepio. He's been gone too long to have gotten lost.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Relax.  I'll talk to Lando and see what I can find out.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I don't trust Lando.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, I don't trust him, either. But he is my friend.  Besides, we'll soon be gone.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: And then you're as good as gone, aren't you?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Where?  Found him in a junk pile?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh, what a mess.  Chewie, do you think you can repair him?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Lando's got people who can fix him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No, thanks.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: I'm sorry.  Am I interrupting anything?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Not really.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us among the clouds.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Thank you.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Will you join me for a little refreshment?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Everyone's invited, of course.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Having trouble with you droid?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No.  No problem.  Why?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: So you see, since we're a small operation, we don't fall into the... uh... jurisdiction of the Empire.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: So you're part of the mining guild then?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: No, not actually.  Our operation is small enough not to be noticed... which is advantageous for everybody since our customers are anxious to avoid attracting attention to themselves.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Aren't you afraid the Empire's going to find out about this little operation and shut you down?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: That's always been a danger looming like a shadow over everything we've built here.  But things have developed that will insure security. I've just made a deal that will keep the Empire out of here forever.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: We would be honored if you would join us.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: I had no choice.  They arrived right before you did.  I'm sorry.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm sorry, too.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No, Threepio's with them.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Just hang on.  We're almost there.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Mmmm.  Oh, my.  Uh, I, uh - Take this off!  I, uh, don't mean to intrude here.  I, don't, no, no, no... Please don't get up.  No!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Stormtroopers?  Here?  We're in danger.  I must tell the others. Oh, no!  I've been shot!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Lord Vader.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You may take Captain Solo to Jabba the Hut after I have Skywalker.

Speaker: boba fett
Dialogue: He's no good to me dead.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: He will not be permanently damaged.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Lord Vader, what about Leia and the Wookiee?

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: They must never again leave this city.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: That was never a condition of our agreement, nor was giving Han to this bounty hunter!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Good.  It would be unfortunate if I had to leave a garrison here.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: This deal's getting worse all the time.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, yes, that's very good.  I like that.  Oh!  Something's not right because now I can't see.  Wait. Wait!  Oh, my!  what have you done? I'm backwards, you stupid furball. Only an overgrown mophead like you would be stupid enough...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I feel terrible.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Why are they doing this?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: They never even asked me any questions.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Lando.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Get out of here, Lando!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Shut up and listen!  Vader has agreed to turn Leia and Chewie over to me.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Over to you?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What about Han?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Vader's giving him to the bounty hunter.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Vader wants us all dead.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: He doesn't want you at all.  He's after somebody called Skywalker.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Lord Vader has set a trap for him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: And we're the bait.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Well, he's on his way.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Perfect.  You fixed us all pretty good, didn't you?  My friend!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Stop!  I've done all I can.  I'm sorry I couldn't do better, but I have my own problems.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, you're a real hero.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You certainly have a way with people.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: This facility is crude, but it should be adequate to freeze Skywalker for his journey to the Emperor.

Speaker: imperial soldier
Dialogue: Lord Vader, ship approaching. X-wing class.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Good.  Monitor Skywalker and allow him to land.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Lord Vader, we only use this facility for carbon freezing.  If you put him in there, it might kill him.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: I do not want the Emperor's prize damaged.  We will test it... on Captain Solo.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: If only you had attached my legs, I wouldn't be in this ridiculous position.  Now, remember, Chewbacca, you have a responsibility to me, so don't do anything foolish.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What's going on... buddy?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You're being put into carbon freeze.

Speaker: boba fett
Dialogue: What if he doesn't survive?  He's worth a lot to me.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Empire will compensate you if he dies.  Put him in!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, no!  No, no, no!  Stop, Chewbacca, stop...!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Stop, Chewie, stop!  Do you hear me?  Stop!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Yes, stop, please!  I'm not ready to die.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie!  Chewie, this won't help me.  Hey!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Save your strength.  There'll be another time.  The princess - you have to take care of her.  You hear me?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I love you!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I know.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: What... what's going on?  Turn round, Chewbacca, I can't see. Oh... they've encased him in carbonite.  He should be quite well-protected - if he survives the freezing process, that is.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Well, Calrissian, did he survive?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Yes, he's alive.  And in perfect hibernation.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: He's all yours bounty hunter. Reset the chamber for Skywalker.

Speaker: imperial officer
Dialogue: Skywalker has just landed, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Good.  See to it that he finds his way here.  Calrissian, take the princess and the Wookiee to my ship.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You said they'd be left in the city under my supervision.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: I am altering the deal.  Pray I don't alter it any further.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke!  Luke, don't - it's a trap!  It's a trap!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Force is with you, young Skywalker.  But you are not a Jedi yet.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Well done.  Hold them in the security tower - and keep it quiet.  Move.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What do you think you're doing?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: We're getting out of here.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I knew all along it had to be a mistake.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Do you think that after what you did to Han we're going to trust you?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: I had no choice...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: What are you doing?  Trust him, trust him!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh, so we understand, don't we, Chewie?  He had no choice.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: I'm just trying to help...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: We don't need any of your help.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: H-a-a-a...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: It sounds like Han.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: There's still a chance to save Han... I mean, at the East Platform...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Chewie.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all, he's only a Wookiee.

Speaker: boba fett
Dialogue: Put Captain Solo in the cargo hold.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo!  Artoo!  Where have you been?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Turn around, you wooly...!  Hurry, hurry!  We're trying to save Han from the bounty hunter!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, at least your still in one piece!  Look what happened to me!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, no!  Chewie, they're behind you!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You have learned much, young one.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You'll find I'm full of surprises.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Your destiny lies with me, Skywalker.  Obi-Wan knew this to be true.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: All to easy.  Perhaps you are not as strong as the Emperor thought.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Impressive... most impressive.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Obi-Wan has taught you well.  You have controlled your fear... now release your anger.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Only your hatred can destroy me.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: The security codes has been changed!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, you can tell the computer to override the security system.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Attention!  This is Lando Calrissian.  The Empire has takes control of the city.  I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: This way.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Don't blame me.  I'm an interpreter. I'm not supposed to know a power socket from a computer terminal.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: What are you talking about?  We're not interested in the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon.  It's fixed!  Just open the door, you stupid lump.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I never doubted you for a second. Wonderful!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Ouch!  Oh!  Ah!  That hurt.  Bend down, you thoughtless... Ow!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Leia!  Go!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me.  Of course, I've looked better.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You are beaten.  It is useless to resist.  Don't let yourself be destroyed as Obi-Wan did.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: There is no escape.  Don't make me destroy you.  You do not yet realize your importance.  You have only begun to discover your power.  Join me and I will complete your training.  With our combined strength, we can end this destructive conflict and bring order to the galaxy.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'll never join you!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: If you only knew the power of the dark side.  Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: He told me enough!  It was you who killed him.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: No.  I am your father.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No.  No.  That's not true! That's impossible!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Search your feelings.  You know it to be true.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No!  No!  No!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Luke.  You can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this.  It is your destiny.  Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son.  Come with me.  It is the only way.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben... Ben, please!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben.  Leia!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hear me!  Leia!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke... We've got to go back.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I know where Luke is.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: But what about those fighter?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Chewie, just do it.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: But what about Vader?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right, all right, all right.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Bring my shuttle.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Look, someone's up there.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: It's Luke.  Chewie, slow down. Slow down and we'll get under him. Lando, open the top hatch.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Okay.  Easy, Chewie.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Lando?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Okay, let's go.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Oh, Leia.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right, Chewie.  Let's go.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'll be back.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Star Destroyer.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right, Chewie.  Ready for light-speed.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: If your people fixed the hyperdrive.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: All the coordinates are set. It's now or never.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Punch it!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: They told me they fixed it.  I trusted them to fix it.  It's not my fault!

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: They'll be in range of our tractor beam in moments, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Did your men deactivate the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Good.  Prepare the boarding party and set your weapons for stun.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Yes, my lord.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Noisy brute.  Why don't we just go into light-speed?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: We can't?  How would you know the hyperdrive is deactivated?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: The city's central computer told you?  Artoo-Detoo, you know better than to trust a strange computer. Ouch!  Pay attention to what you're doing!

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Luke.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Father.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Son, come with me.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Chewie!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: It's Vader.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Luke... it is your destiny.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Alert all commands.  Ready for the tractor beam.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, come back at once!  You haven't finished with me yet! You don't know how to fix the hyperdrive.  Chewbacca can do it.  I'm standing here in pieces, and you're having delusions of grandeur!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, you did it!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Luke, we're ready for takeoff.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Good luck, Lando

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty hunter, we'll contact you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'll meet you at the rendezvous point on Tatooine.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Princess, we'll find Han.  I promise.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Chewie, I'll be waiting for your signal.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Take care, you two.  May the Force be with you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Ow!
